          <title>
            <string language="fr">Fuite de substance radioactive des centrales nucléaires</string>
            <string language="en">Radioactive substance leakage from nuclear power stations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radioaktives Substanzdurchsickern von 
Atomkraftwerk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escapamento radioativo da substância das 
estações de potência nuclear</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perdita radioattiva della sostanza dalle centrali
nucleari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ραδιενεργός διαρροή ουσιών από τους σταθμούς 
πυρηνικής ενέργειας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Salida radiactiva de la sustancia de centrales 
nucleares</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre trois façons suivant lesquelles  les substances radioactives des centrales nucléaires peuvent  s'échapper dans l'environnement.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows three ways how radioactive substances from nuclear power stations can escape into the environment.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">air</string>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fuite</string>
            <string language="en">leakage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">centrales nucléaires</string>
            <string language="en">nuclear power stations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">substances radioactives</string>
            <string language="en">Radioactive substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">sous-terre</string>
            <string language="en">underground</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'eau</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt drei Möglichkeiten, wie 
radioaktive Substanzen von Atomkraftwerk in die Umgebung entgehen 
können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a três maneiras como as
substâncias radioativas das estações de potência nuclear podem se 
escapar no ambiente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra a tre modi come le 
sostanze radioattive dalle centrali nucleari possono fuoriuscire 
nell'ambiente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τρεις τρόπους πώς οι 
ραδιενεργές ουσίες από τους σταθμούς πυρηνικής ενέργειας 
μπορούν να δραπετεύσουν στο περιβάλλον.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a tres maneras cómo las
sustancias radiactivas de centrales nucleares pueden escaparse en el 
ambiente.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
